column1: # Use as many lines of text as you need.
# All text following the ""Method:"" keyword will be regarded as part of your free text methods description.
Microstate populations for the SAMPL6 pKa molecules were predicted using Epik from the 2017-2 Schrodinger suite.
The SMILES structure provided in the MobleyLab/SAMPL6 github repo was used as input for ligprep. A single
column2: neutral tautomer of the molecule with a 3d structure was generated. This structure was then used as input for Epik calculations.

column1: Epik calculations were run in scan mode to predict pKa values between 2.0 and 12.0
column2: starting at the structure predicted for pH 7.4.

column1: Results were processed using pandas. Scripts are available at https://github.com/choderalab/SAMPL6-Epik-pKa
